Corporate Responsibility Insights

Sustainability is at the core of Lonza. That is how we conduct business and how we create value for our stakeholders. Sustainability is reﬂected in our long—term business approach to sustainably grow along and beyond the healthcare continuum and to contribute with our products and services to patient’s health, preventive healthcare and safe environment we are living in.

We approach sustainability from three perspectives: environmental, social and governance perspective.
